--- layout: datasheet ---

Suricata Intrusion Detection System is a network threat detection engine. The integration to SensorFleet solution allows easily deployable and manageable intrusion detection.

Suricata IDS has been tightly integrated into SensorFleet solution. Instrument provides an easy way for system administrators to deploy Suricata IDS instances in the network. Rule lists can be managed using either Rule Manager Instrument or Rule Importer Instrument without resorting into a command line interface, which is the usual approach for plain Suricata installations.

Properties

Developer SensorFleet Oy
Categories Attack Detection, Traffic Analysis, IDS
Network access type Passive
Required interfaces Monitored network (mirror-bridge with receive capabilities)
Dependencies None
Related Instruments Rule Manager, Rule Importer
Data retention The latest rule lists are stored in Suricata IDSâ€™s persistent data.
Management UI No
Performance Suricata Instrument easily handles several gigabits per second of traffic on a F-Probe hardware on a typical traffic profile.
